name: Designer's Library | 400+ useful resources for designer
description:
I have accumulated hundreds of useful and necessary resources and services on my tabs. I decided to organize and catalog all the utilities so that they would help not only me, but also other members of the design community.


The result is an open library of resources and services for designers, which includes more than 400 useful resources in the designer's work:


https://designlibz.com/


Get inspired, created and delight customers! And follow me :)


Update:

I still have a few unassembled tabs in the browser, until February the library will be replenished with ~30 more useful resources for designers.
